abilities.name: Sticky Goo
abilities.effect: As long as Dark Muk is your Active Pokémon, your opponent pays ColorlessColorless more to retreat his or her Active Pokémon."

attacks.name: Slimy Water
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage times the number of Colorless Energy in the Defending Pokémon's Retreat Cost (after applying effects to the Retreat Cost)."

attacks.name: Acidic Poison
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Burned and Poisoned.
